Getting StartedÂ¶

Pytonik framework supports python version from 2.7 to newer, Pytonik can be download from https://pypi.org/pytonik using command line promote pip install pytonik or https://github.com/pytonik/pytonik The installation will automatically be extracted into site-packages in Python directory.
